apple_vendor_description: The medium skin tone woman-woman couple with heart emoji on Apple devices presents a heartwarming scene with its smooth, organic shapes and gentle shading. Two women are depicted side-by-side, their forms rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D effect, creating a sense of depth and tenderness. A stylized heart, glowing with soft light, floats between them, embodying love, partnership, and deep affection in a beautifully inclusive representation.
